Class GuestController

java.lang.Object
com.erahotel.era_backend.controller.GuestController
@CrossOrigin("*") @RestController @RequestMapping("/api/guests") public class GuestController extends Object
REST controller for managing guest-related operations in the system privides endpoints for creating, retrieving, updating, and deleting guest records, as well as appending reservation ID's to guests.

All endpoints are accessible under the "/api/guests" base path.

Author:
Alwin Roble

      @GetMapping public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<List<GuestDto>> getAllGuests()
      Retrieves all guests in the system.
      Returns:
      list of all guests

    • getGuestById

      @GetMapping("{id}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<GuestDto> getGuestById(@PathVariable("id") Long guestId)
      Retrieves a guest by its unique ID.
      Parameters:
      guestId - the ID of the guest to retrieve
      Returns:
      the matching guest record

    • getGuestByEmail

      @GetMapping("/email/{email}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<GuestDto> getGuestByEmail(@PathVariable("email") String email)
      Retrieves a guest by their email address.
      Parameters:
      email - the email address to search for
      Returns:
      the matching guest record

    • createGuest

      @PostMapping public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<GuestDto> createGuest(@RequestBody GuestDto guestDto)
      Creates a new guest record.
      Parameters:
      guestDto - the guest data to be saved
      Returns:
      the saved guest record with a 201 CREATED status

    • deleteGuest

      @DeleteMapping("{id}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<String> deleteGuest(@PathVariable("id") Long guestId)
      Deletes a guest by ID.
      Parameters:
      guestId - the ID of the guest to delete
      Returns:
      success message

    • updateGuest

      @PutMapping("/{id}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<GuestDto> updateGuest(@PathVariable("id") Long guestId, @RequestBody GuestDto updatedGuest)
      Updates an existing guest's details.
      Parameters:
      guestId - the ID of the guest to update
      Returns:
      the updated guest record

    • addReservationToGuest

      @PostMapping("/{id}/reservations") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<GuestDto> addReservationToGuest(@PathVariable("id") Long guestId, @RequestBody String reservationId)
      Appends a reservation ID to the guest's reservation list.
      Parameters:
      guestId - the ID of the guest to update
      reservationId - the reservation ID to add
      Returns:
      the updated guest record
